Lets see Rey's ability to digitlay erase weapons that will kill her ...yes it is there clearly in the finished product look at the guards weapons as he draws back once he arm locks her.   poor storytelling I mean yes do not get me wrong there are bad films but this one is incredibly overrated.     to suggest one is to critical of this film because its aimed at children...no   it was a terible film chock full of garbage.  it wasn't aimed at children because children would have grown bored too during it.
